service-title: QCS LLC was established in the year 2016 as a consulting organization for implementation of quality, environmental, health & safety, transport and IT management system requirements.
service-desc-1: In July 2018, QCS LLC become a certification body. We obtained AZS ISO/IEC 17021:2014 certificate from Azerbaijan Accreditation Center (AZAK) for the provision of certification audits against requirements of ISO 9001:2015, ISO 14001:2015, ISO 45001:2018, and ISO 22000:2018 standards.
service-desc-2: Our organization conducts certification audits in accordance with AZS ISO/IEC 17021-1:2021 “Assessment of conformity. Requirements for bodies providing audit and certification of management systems
service-desc-3: We also provide software solutions – Quality Assurance, OH&S and Enviromental Management systems related web applications & other products for individual company processes
training-desc: Our seminars and trainings are developed by industry experts..
solution-desc: LORDS software: the program that allows any organization...
audit-desc: ISO certification is proof from a third party, that you comply with one...
qcs-footer-desc: QCS LLC is an independent non-governmental organization dedicated to promoting sustainable certification, auditing, inspection, consulting, training and educational services.
